Boardwalk Client Virtual Machine - JavaScript

    • 1. Introduction


      The Boardwalk Client Virtual Machine - JavaScript (henceforth referred to as the BCVMJS) is a client library that simplifies interaction with the Boardwalk Application Engine. The BCVMJS is designed with following goals in mind:

      1. Simplify working with Boardwalk data
      2. Simplify access and invocation of the REST APIs in the Boardwalk Application Engine
      3. Enable access to multiple 'grids' in multiple application engines
      4. Load and maintain specific Boardwalk data items on the client-side, acting like a cache
      5. Provide a simplified mechanism for manipulating Boardwalk data
      6. Accumulate a series of changes on Boardwalk data, without having to submit to the server for each change.
      7. Submit such a series of changes in a single transaction to the Boardwalk Application Engine
      8. Provide access to the history of information stored in the Boardwalk Application Engine

      To summarize, BCVMJS is a stateful client-side SDK that simplifies manipulation of data residing in an Boardwalk Application Engine.
